description.p: binjr is a time series browser; it renders time series data produced by other applications as dynamically editable representations and provides advanced features to navigate the data smoothly and efficiently (drag & drop, zoom, history, detachable tabs, advanced time-range picker).

It aims to be the missing link between the collection of disparate tools (text editors, graphing & CLI utilities) traditionally used by developers to analyse forensic data locally and full-blown analytics platforms that centralize logs and telemetry for entire organizations.
